snippet: Video of the CBS News correspondent Lara Logan apologizing for her flawed “60 Minutes” report on the deadly assault on the American diplomatic compound in Benghazi, Libya, last year.
abstract: Video of the CBS News correspondent Lara Logan apologizing for her flawed “60 Minutes” report on the deadly assault on the American diplomatic compound in Benghazi, Libya, last year.

headline.main: Lara Logan's On-Air Apology for Flawed Benghazi Report
